Package it.polimi.vovarini.model

Interface GameDataAccessor

All Known Implementing Classes:
Game, ViewData
public interface GameDataAccessor
This interface specifies the methods that all objects containing data pertaining to a Santorini game should implement.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Board getBoard()
    Getter method for the board where the game is played
    Phase getCurrentPhase()
    Getter method for the current phase in the Game
    Player getCurrentPlayer()
    Getter method for the player currently playing in the game
    Player[] getPlayers()
    Getter method for the players in the Game
    boolean isFull()
    This method checks if a Game has all players registered
    void nextPlayer()
    This method points to the nextPlayer
    void setCurrentPhase​(Phase phase)
    Setter method for the current phase in the game

  • Method Details

    • getCurrentPhase

      Phase getCurrentPhase()
      Getter method for the current phase in the Game
      Returns:
      the current phase in the game

    • getPlayers

      Player[] getPlayers()
      Getter method for the players in the Game
      Returns:
      the players in the Game

    • getCurrentPlayer

      Player getCurrentPlayer()
      Getter method for the player currently playing in the game
      Returns:
      the player currently playing in the game

    • setCurrentPhase

      void setCurrentPhase​(Phase phase)
      Setter method for the current phase in the game
      Parameters:
      phase - a value of Phase I want to be set as the current phase in the game

    • isFull

      boolean isFull()
      This method checks if a Game has all players registered
      Returns:
      true if the game has all players registered, false otherwise

    • nextPlayer

      void nextPlayer()
      This method points to the nextPlayer
